sub_title: Moving the needle with Product Management | New Business Creation | Marketing | HealthTech Innovation | Philanthropy
summary:
Passionate for healthtech innovation and new business creation. A product evangelist driven by what makes customers tick. A track record of over 18 years of experience in the healthcare industry, specifically in clinical informatics, medical devices, and patient engagement.

Experienced in product management, upstream product marketing, and new business development. Specialized in bridging the gap between users and technology, by getting a good grasp of end-user and customer insights, creating customer-driven value propositions, and driving these innovations from idea to market launch. 

A conceptual thinker focusing on creating impact and driving for results. A self-starter with an entrepreneurial mindset and a ‘can-do’ attitude, with experience in complex stakeholder management and leading multidisciplinary teams.

Strong international and intercultural profile: experience in Canada, USA, Netherlands, Hong Kong, Peru.
